name: Naan Breakfast Pizza Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: naan bread, baked beans, tikka masala sauce, cheddar cheese, egg
recipeInstructionSteps: Mix together baked beans and tikka masala sauce and pour evenly on naan bread.
Make a dent in the melted cheese with an egg, then crack into the dent.
Bake for another ten mins at 190°C (375°F).
